Package org.castor.ddl.schemaobject

This package contains SchemaObject for ddl creation including Table, Field, KeyGenerator, Index, Schema and KeyRepository.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
SchemaObject An interface for all SchemaObject
Created on Jun 23, 2006 - 6:15:17 PM
 

Class Summary
AbstractSchemaObject AbstractSchemaObject is the base class for Table, Field, ForeignKey, KeyGenerator...
Field Field handles informations for creating field's sql.
ForeignKey ForeignKey handle information for foreign key creation.
HighLowKey HighLowKey is not used for DDL Generator
Created on Jun 24, 2006 - 2:04:24 AM
IdentityKey IDENTITY key generator can be used only with autoincrement primary key columns (identities) with Sybase ASE/ASA, MS SQL Server, MySQL and Hypersonic SQL.
Index Current implemetation is not supported INDEX creation
Created on Jun 23, 2006 - 6:25:09 PM
KeyGenerator KeyGenerator is abstract class for Key generator
Created on Jun 23, 2006 - 5:44:13 PM
KeyRepository KeyRepository handles KeyGenerators
Created on Jun 24, 2006 - 2:10:05 AM
MaxKey MaxKey is not used for DDL Generator
Created on Jun 24, 2006 - 2:03:55 AM
Schema Schema contains a set of table and schema options.
SchemaFactory Factory provides a way to create schema objects
Created on Jul 4, 2006 - 3:01:20 PM
SequenceKey SEQUENCE key generator can be used only with Oracle, PostgreSQL, Interbase and SAP DB.
Table Table contains fields, foreignkeys, indexes and table's options
Created on Jun 23, 2006 - 6:22:33 PM
UUIDKey UUIDKey is not used for DDL Generator
Created on Jun 24, 2006 - 2:05:13 AM
 

Package org.castor.ddl.schemaobject Description

This package contains SchemaObject for ddl creation including Table, Field, KeyGenerator, Index, Schema and KeyRepository. SchemaObject supports to generate "standard" DDL for various DBs. The specific DBs must overwrite SchemaObject if the target DDL is different with the "standard"

Author:
Le Duc Bao
